name: Teenager vs.Tropical Mutants
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Teenager vs.Tropical Mutants is a classic TDS arena where you have to fight off the waves of mutants that destroy everything in their path.

Use everything you find to destroy enemies.

Around the scattered explosive barrels, which will help in the fight against enemies. The main thing is not to stand close when they explode!

Choose cartridges, first-aid kits, which gradually appear in random places on the map and you will succeed.

Beat the waves of enemies that appear one after another! Know, monsters will not let you rest and gather with strength!

★ Soft gameplay
★ Arena with many enemies
★ 3 kinds of locations
